welcome_message_body: Welcome to the charming City of Isabela! Known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Jollibee
restaurants.description: Jollibee is a fast food restaurant located in Isabela.

restaurants.name: Ramyeon Keopi
restaurants.description: Ramyeon Keopi is a korean restaurant located in Isabela.

restaurants.name: Bunso Fast Food
restaurants.description: Bunso Fast Food is a halal restaurant located in Isabela.

restaurants.name: Chooks-to-Go
restaurants.description: Chooks-to-Go is a bbq joint located in Isabela.

restaurants.name: Trisha's Burger Station
restaurants.description: Trisha's Burger Station is a burger joint located in Isabela.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zamboanga International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zamboanga International Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
